articles.title: Nicki Minaj shows support for Kenneth Petty on Instagram after his sentencing to in-home detention - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nicki Minaj's husband Kenneth Petty was sentenced to one year of in-home detention and three years probation for failing to register as a sex offender.
articles.content:
